engine.rendering

Interface ArrayBitmap.IVisitor

  • Enclosing class:
    ArrayBitmap

    public static interface ArrayBitmap.IVisitor
    Interface for visiting every pixel in an ArrayBitmap.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void visit(int x, int y, int pixel)
      Function that is called for every pixel in the bitmap.

    • Method Detail

      • visit

        void visit(int x,
         int y,
         int pixel)
        Function that is called for every pixel in the bitmap.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the pixel.
        y - The y coordinate of the pixel.
        pixel - The 32-bit ARGB color of the pixel.
